info.name: Simple Navigation Toolbar
info.description:
Keeps the navigation toolbar layout as simple as possible

When not hovering on it or tabs, the urlbar takes up most
of the width, having everything that can be collapsed 
expand on hover instead of allways visible
info.additionalInfo:
Note - April 2016: this' nolonger compatible with Firefox, but does still work in Palemoon

Before installing/enabling it, first move the urlbar to the 
left and searchbar to the right, and put the stop and reload 
buttons before the searchbar (stop needs to be before reload)
